title: [QUESTION] How to generate a native debug build?
body:
I can't find any information on how to generate a debug build? 

Since Skia doesn't have a debug layer like DirectX, Vulkan or OpenGL, sometimes it is insanely hard to track down why a function returns `false` or `null`.  So having a debug build can be very handy.

Is it just a matter of passing `-c Debug` to `./bootstrapper.ps1`? That didn't seem to work for me, but maybe something else went wrong.
